quotes.quote: yo guys what up my dude bob here just kickin it ya know got a whole bag of doritos here the nacho cheese ones so good or maybe theyre lays classic cant even tell anymore totally zoned out crunch crunch anyway my brains just kinda doin that spinny thing thinkin bout all sorts of wild stuff like seriously how do ceiling fans even stay up that things just hangin there defying gravity like a boss makes you think right and the socks man the socks where do they bail to in the laundry its like they got a secret portal to another dimension or somethin conspiracy im tellin ya one minute you got a pair the next its a solo mission for one lucky foot deep thoughts while im chowin down on these chips i swear oh yeah saw this bird the other day flash of blue zoomin through the sky pretty fly for a bird haha made me think about nature and stuff for like a whole minute then i remembered i had more chips priorities am i right speaking of things that make you go hmmm whats the deal with gas prices still being outta control my wallets lookin kinda thin you feel me just throwin that out there no biggie maybe you got some kinda secret plan to fix that just a thought from a dude with a bag of chips then theres like the whole universe thing its huge right makes you feel kinda small but also kinda cool that were even here eatin chips and thinkin bout it wild stuff and dont even get me started on traffic seriously its like everyone decides to hit the road at the exact same time maybe we need teleportation just spitballin here between chip crunches oh and you know those little plastic bits at the end of shoelaces aglets thats what theyre called just learned that the other day random fact for your presidential brain you never know when that kinda knowledge might come in handy anyway my chip bags gettin dangerously low gotta conserve the crumbs its been real bro keep doin your thing and try not to think too much about fallin ceiling fans or vanishin socks itll keep ya up at night peace out bob
quotes.author: bob

quotes.quote: on the day of May 25, 2025, all of the numbers in the date will end in five and only contain twos and fives as well as a zero in the year (unless you say 25 as the year instead of 2025). If this is the quote of the day, then the day this is the quote of the day is 5/25/25.
quotes.author: Smart math person

quotes.quote: There's nothing worse than cold tamales.
quotes.author: someone

quotes.quote: You are 1/1000 of a speck compared to 1000 refrigerators, if 1000 refrigerators is the size of the universe at every point in time.
quotes.author: Wise man
